page.title: 14POTTERS CORNER (2)
page.content:
This square is fairly flat and open.
There are three roads in the area, two of these roads run over the railway. The road bridges are within sight of each other. The railway has just two tracks which run past the{golf course which covers a small proportion of the area.
A new development of this area is the extention of the{M20 Motor-way}shortly due start. This motor-way will run through part of the golf course and along the N.E. of the railway line.
A number of the houses near the railway line will be demolished to make way for the{M20.}Of those local people interviewed, there were none who objected strongly to the{M20 extention.
